 `.________________________________________________________________.' _.' _.' .

 .----------------------------- r e l e a s e info --------------------------+
 |                                                                           '
 -  "Time Stops, it's the world of silence."                                 '
 '  Constant C is a puzzle based 2D platformer. You play as a  rescue  robot
    in  a  space  station  where  the time has stopped and you have to fight
 `  against this fatal crisis with your courage and intelligence.
 `
 `  The  core  elements  of  this  game  are  Stage Objects, Time Circle and
 .  Gravity Shifting:
 :
 |  Ã‚Âº Stage Objects
 |  There are various objects with different properties in  each stage. Some
 |  of them are helpful, some of them are dangerous, but be careful  because
 |  most of them can be a double-edged sword!
 |
 |  Ã‚Âº Time Circle
 |  All objects are static in this  world, and your Time Circle is  the only
 |  way  to  make  them  move  on. Use  your  smarts  to turn obstacles into
 |  stepping stones!
 |
 |  Ã‚Âº Gravity Shifting
 |  This advanced skill will not only let you dodge deadly  traps, but  also
 |  perform many spectacular  actions! Turbo  jump, manipulate  inertia  and
 |  even super cool ninja dive!
 |
 |  Features :
 |
 |  Ã‚Âº Puzzle games involving real physics.
 |  Ã‚Âº Epic story with intriguing developments.
 |  Ã‚Âº Over 100 original-designed stages.
 |  Ã‚Âº Mind blowing puzzles. **Warning! May cause brain damage**
 |  Ã‚Âº Stunning 2D graphics with dark and mysterious atmosphere.
 |  Ã‚Âº Extra game modes.
 |  ...And a lot MORE!!
 |                                                                           :
 |  More info : http://constantc.igsplay.com/index.html                      |
 |                                                                           |
 |  Support Developers, vote this game on Steam Greenlight at :              |
 |                                                                           |
 |          |
 |                                                                           |

.'   .----------`-------'------ r e l e a s e notes -------------------------.
i   i                                                                        '
|   |  1# Unzip, Unrar manually.                                             '
|   |  2# Run setup.bat, after thats done hit ConstantC.exe to play.
|   |  3# Have phun!
|   |
|   |  Ripped: Nothing.
|   |
|   |  Game Notes: Some time ago we released v1.0 of this great game, now we
|   |              brings you v1.02 wich have some bug fixes and add support
|   |              to Japanese language.
|   |
|   |  Notes: This game requires Microsoft XNA Framework Redistributable 4.0
|   |         and also Microsoft .NET Framework 4. If you need, you can find
|   |         on gamefolder redist.
|   |
|   |  REMEMBER :                                                            .
|   |  If you like this game, buy it. Developers deserve your support!!      :
